analyzed: @1b # // so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
translated: The Compendium of Monastic Discipline, a commentary on the Sūtra of Individual Liberation,

original: bam po sum cu dgu pa /
analyzed: bam po sum cu dgu pa /
translated: Volume thirty-nine

original: nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
analyzed: nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
translated: The introduction to the downfall that occurs through listening

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
translated: The Buddha, the Blessed One, stayed in Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

original: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum byas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum byas /
translated: When the venerable Udayana had abandoned all the defilements and realized arhatship,

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'ama b'ir song ste snying las chung ngur 'dug /'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'ama b'ir song ste snying las chung ngur 'dug /'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab /
translated: the venerable Saṅgharakṣita went to Kauśāmbī and stayed there in a state of little activity, while Atimānina and Upāli were in time.

original: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa de'i tshe na bcu bdun sde'i chogs dag gdug cing pha rol gnon pa dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin par gyur nas de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa de'i tshe na bcu bdun sde'i chogs dag gdug cing pha rol gnon pa dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin par gyur nas de dag gis smras pa /
translated: When Nanda and Upananda were in the midst of the Saṅgha, the group of seventeen was wicked and oppressive, and they became holders of the sūtras, holders of the Vinaya, and holders of the Mātṛkā. They said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho 'tshams te /🔽ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho 'tshams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis mtho ma btsams la /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho 'tshams te / ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho 'tshams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis mtho ma btsams la /
translated: “Venerable ones, for a long time the group of six has harassed us.🔽Just as Nanda and Upananda have harassed us, no one else has harassed us.

original: ji ltar nye dgas tho 'tshams pa ltar nga yang dga' bos ma btsams @2a # //
analyzed: ji ltar nye dgas tho 'tshams pa ltar nga yang dga' bos ma btsams @2a # //
translated: Just as Upananda has harassed us, Nanda has not harassed us.

original: kyis de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
analyzed: kyis de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
translated: So let’s do a procedure of ejecting him from the place.”

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: They said,🔽“Venerable ones, let’s do a procedure of ejecting him from the place.”

original: 'di'i phu bo dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin gyi tshur sheg je gros bya'o zhes de dag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs te sgo bcad nas gros bya bar brtsams pa dang / nye dgas skar khung nas nyan cing des de dag la bsdigs te /
analyzed: 'di'i phu bo dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin gyi tshur sheg je gros bya'o zhes de dag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs te sgo bcad nas gros bya bar brtsams pa dang / nye dgas skar khung nas nyan cing des de dag la bsdigs te /
translated: His elder brother Nanda is skilled in debate. Let’s go to him and discuss this.” They entered the council chamber, closed the door, and began to discuss the matter.

original: kye ma bcu bdun sde dag ci'i phyir gros byed /
analyzed: kye ma bcu bdun sde dag ci'i phyir gros byed /
translated: Udayīna was listening through a window and said to them, “Hey, Group of Seventeen, why are you discussing this?

original: kho bo tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
analyzed: kho bo tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
translated: Some of us fellow practitioners are in complete nirvana.

original: la la ni snying las chung du kho nar 'dug kha cig ni dus la bab pas da 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o snyam du sems sam /
analyzed: la la ni snying las chung du kho nar 'dug kha cig ni dus la bab pas da 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o snyam du sems sam /
translated: Some are just taking it easy. Some are in time. Do you think we should do a procedure to expel him from the monastery?”

original: ci khyod kyis da kho bo cag zil gyis mnan te 'khod snyam mam /
analyzed: ci khyod kyis da kho bo cag zil gyis mnan te 'khod snyam mam /
translated: “Do you think you can outshine us and stay here?”

original: kho bo cag gis kyang khyed la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis kyang khyed la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o //
translated: “We’ll put a stop to you!”🔽“The rope of the elephant

original: khyed kyis / glang po'i thag pa nyi ma dang // rlung gis yongs su bskams gyur cing //
analyzed: khyed kyis / glang po'i thag pa nyi ma dang // rlung gis yongs su bskams gyur cing //
translated: is dried by the sun and wind.

original: glang po'i gnya' nas lhung gyur kyang //
analyzed: glang po'i gnya' nas lhung gyur kyang //
translated: Even if you fall from the neck of an elephant,

original: lug ni lnga brgyas drang bar bya //
analyzed: lug ni lnga brgyas drang bar bya //
translated: you are carried by five hundred sheep.”

original: zhes bya ba ma thos sam zhes bsdigs pa dang / de dag gis bsams pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ma thos sam zhes bsdigs pa dang / de dag gis bsams pa /
translated: “Have you not heard this?”

original: 'dis bdag cag gros byed pa 'phrigs kyi gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes de dag me khang du zhugs te gros bya bar brtsams pa dang / nye dga' yang 'jab cing der 'ongs te nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so //
analyzed: 'dis bdag cag gros byed pa 'phrigs kyi gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes de dag me khang du zhugs te gros bya bar brtsams pa dang / nye dga' yang 'jab cing der 'ongs te nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so //
translated: They thought, “He has overheard our discussion. Let’s go somewhere else.” They went to the sauna and began to discuss things, but Upasena crept in and listened. He scolded them as before.

original: de dag steng khang dang / bar khang dang / @2b gnas khang dang / khyams dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chags dang / span spun dag gi nang dang / dgon pa dang / tshang tshing gi nang dang / lam nas 'dong zhing gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /
analyzed: de dag steng khang dang / bar khang dang / @2b gnas khang dang / khyams dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chags dang / span spun dag gi nang dang / dgon pa dang / tshang tshing gi nang dang / lam nas 'dong zhing gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /
translated: They went to the upper story, the middle story, the ground floor, the courtyard, the gatehouse, the terraces, the roof, the garden, the forest, and the road, and began to discuss things.

original: nye dga' yang phyi bzhin song te nyan cing des de dag tu yang de bzhin du bsdigs nas /
analyzed: nye dga' yang phyi bzhin song te nyan cing des de dag tu yang de bzhin du bsdigs nas /
translated: Upasena followed them and listened. He scolded them as before.

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: They said,🔽“We can’t discuss things in private. Let’s go to the monastery.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus kyis 'di la bzod par gsol bar bya'o zhes de dag gis de la smras pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus kyis 'di la bzod par gsol bar bya'o zhes de dag gis de la smras pa /
translated: “Venerables, we cannot perform the act of ejecting him from the monastery. We must ask his forgiveness.”

original: btsun pa nye dga' bdag cag la bzod pa mdzod cig / nye dgas smras pa /
analyzed: btsun pa nye dga' bdag cag la bzod pa mdzod cig / nye dgas smras pa /
translated: They said to him, “Venerable Upasena, please forgive us.”

original: bzod par bya'o //🔽de dag gis de la dris pa /
analyzed: bzod par bya'o // de dag gis de la dris pa /
translated: Upasena said, “I forgive you.”

original: khyod kyis kho bo cag gros byed pa ji ltar shes /
analyzed: khyod kyis kho bo cag gros byed pa ji ltar shes /
translated: They asked him, “How did you know that we were discussing you?”

original: nye dgas skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang / de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: nye dgas skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang / de dag gis smras pa /
translated: Upasena related the circumstances in detail.

original: khyod nyan rnas 'dug tu rung ngam /
analyzed: khyod nyan rnas 'dug tu rung ngam /
translated: They said, “Is it appropriate for you to listen in?”

original: nye dgas smras pa /
analyzed: nye dgas smras pa /
translated: Upasena said,🔽“If I had not listened in when you were discussing me, you would have performed the act of ejecting me from the monastery.”

original: gal te kho bos khyed cag gros byed pa'i tshe nyan rnas 'dug par ma gyur du zin na khyed cag gis kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas par gyur to zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams 'thab
analyzed: gal te kho bos khyed cag gros byed pa'i tshe nyan rnas 'dug par ma gyur du zin na khyed cag gis kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas par gyur to zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams 'thab
translated: The monks who had few desires complained and criticized him, “How could monks quarrel,🔽bicker,

original: par gyur / mtshang 'dru bar gyur /
analyzed: par gyur / mtshang 'dru bar gyur /
translated: and

original: mi mthun par gyur /
analyzed: mi mthun par gyur /
translated: They are not in agreement.🔽They are arguing and disagreeing. I will listen to what these monks say and then I will use that as an excuse to say whatever I want.”

original: rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te cang mi smra bar nyan nas 'dug par byed ces smod par
analyzed: rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te cang mi smra bar nyan nas 'dug par byed ces smod par
translated: They criticized him,

original: byed / phyar ka gtong bar byed /
analyzed: byed / phyar ka gtong bar byed /
translated: ridiculed him, and complained about him.

original: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The monks reported this matter to the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de nye dga' la smad nas /🔽dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang / gleng gzhi 'di dang / skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de nye dga' la smad nas / dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One, in this connection, in this context, gathered the saṅgha of monks and reproached Upāli:🔽“This is not in accordance with the Dharma,

original: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
translated: it is not in accordance with the monastic code,

original: rung ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa /
translated: it is not suitable,

original: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
analyzed: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
translated: it is not proper for one gone forth to do.”🔽He censured him in many ways and then said to the monks,

original: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /🔽yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams 'thab par gyur /
analyzed: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste / yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams 'thab par gyur /
translated: Having seen the ten benefits of establishing the training rules, I have laid down for my disciples this basis of training:

original: mtshang 'bru bar gyur /🔽mi mthun par gyur /🔽rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la /🔽dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du @3a * //
analyzed: mtshang 'bru bar gyur / mi mthun par gyur / rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la / dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du @3a * //
translated: ‘If a monk listens to the side of one party in a dispute among the monks,🔽and then listens to the side of the other party, thinking, “I will repeat what they say and thereby settle the matter,”

original: byas te cang mi smra bas nyan rnas 'dug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: byas te cang mi smra bas nyan rnas 'dug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: and if he then repeats what they say and thereby settles the matter, then, if he does this on purpose, his act constitutes a pāyattika offense.’”

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The place was Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni nye dga'/🔽nyon mongs pa ni sha glan pa'i bsam pa /
analyzed: gang zag ni nye dga'/ nyon mongs pa ni sha glan pa'i bsam pa /
translated: The person was Nyagrodha.🔽The affliction was malice.

original: nyes pa ni rtsod pa'i gros la nyan rna byed pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni rtsod pa'i gros la nyan rna byed pa'o //
translated: The misdeed was listening to the advice of those who were disputing.

original: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: As for a certain monk, it refers to Upasena of the Śākyas or anyone else like him.

original: dge slong rnams zhes bya ba ni chos 'di ba rnams so //
analyzed: dge slong rnams zhes bya ba ni chos 'di ba rnams so //
translated: As for the monks, it refers to those who follow this teaching.

original: 'thab par gyur /🔽mtshang 'bru bar gyur /🔽mi mthun par gyur /
analyzed: 'thab par gyur / mtshang 'bru bar gyur / mi mthun par gyur /
translated: They were quarreling,🔽finding fault with each other,🔽disagreeing,

original: rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: and living in a state of conflict.

original: dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bsam pas gnyen pos de lta de ltar pha rol mnan par bya'o snyam pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bsam pas gnyen pos de lta de ltar pha rol mnan par bya'o snyam pa'o //
translated: Thinking, I will listen to what these monks say and then I will make a pronouncement accordingly, with such an attitude he thought, I will refute them in such and such a way.

original: de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
translated: As for taking that as the occasion, it is not something else.

original: cang mi smra bas nyan rnas 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni cad mi smra bas rna gtad pas 'dug na'o //
analyzed: cang mi smra bas nyan rnas 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni cad mi smra bas rna gtad pas 'dug na'o //
translated: As for sitting silently, listening, it is sitting with one's ears directed towards them, not saying anything.

original: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The offense of wrongdoing is as before.

original: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the offense here?

original: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the offense should be understood by the characteristics of the basic offense, the preparation, the preparation for the preparation, the non-offenses, the trainings, and the restoration.

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis dge slong dag rtsod par gyur pa dge slong dag dang gros byed pa na nye bar zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs par 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol bas mnyan pa'i phyir rna gtong
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis dge slong dag rtsod par gyur pa dge slong dag dang gros byed pa na nye bar zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs par 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol bas mnyan pa'i phyir rna gtong
translated: Here, the basic offense is as follows: If a monk, when monks are disputing, listens with the intention of stirring up trouble, except when he wants to pacify the monks and is listening in order to resolve the dispute,🔽he commits an offense.

original: cing sgra'i don go ba dang / lam nor tam zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs par don gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis son cing shes pa'i 'og tu rkang pa dang se gol dang lud pa'i sgra dag gis go bar mi byed na nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cing sgra'i don go ba dang / lam nor tam zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs par don gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis son cing shes pa'i 'og tu rkang pa dang se gol dang lud pa'i sgra dag gis go bar mi byed na nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: Except for the desire to go to a place of rest or to a place of peace, if one does not make oneself understood by the sound of one’s feet, fingersnap, or by clearing one’s throat, after having gone to a place and understood the meaning by the power of another, then one commits the actual downfall through disrespect, a downfall that is a part of the class of downfalls that are root afflictions.🔽If a monk who is in dispute with other monks does not criticize the basis of the dispute with the other monks,

original: dge slong dang rtsod par gyur pa dge slong dag dang gros byed pa'i rtsod pa'i gzhi dang dge slong ji snyed pa dang / gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: dge slong dang rtsod par gyur pa dge slong dag dang gros byed pa'i rtsod pa'i gzhi dang dge slong ji snyed pa dang / gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
translated: or if he does not criticize any of the monks,

original: steng khang dang / bar khang dang / 'og khang dang ; gnas khang dang / khyams dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa dang / lam dang / lam gol pa la sogs pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: steng khang dang / bar khang dang / 'og khang dang ; gnas khang dang / khyams dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa dang / lam dang / lam gol pa la sogs pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
translated: or if he does not criticize any of the places, such as the upper, middle, or lower parts of the monastery, the temple, the courtyard, the door, the steps, the walkway, the forest, the road, or the side road,🔽then he commits the actual downfall through disrespect.

original: nye bar zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs par 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol ba la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs par 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol ba la na smad pa med do //
translated: Except for the desire for peace, there is no fault in engaging in disputes.

original: mnyan pa'i phyir @3b rna gtod cing sgra'i don go ba la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: mnyan pa'i phyir @3b rna gtod cing sgra'i don go ba la na smad pa med do //
translated: Except for the desire to hear, there is no fault in understanding the meaning of the sound.

original: lam nor tam zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs par don gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis son zhing shes pa'i 'og tu rkang pa dang se gol dang lud pa'i sgra dag gis go bar mi byed pa lan smad pa med do //
analyzed: lam nor tam zhi bar 'dod pa ma gtogs par don gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyis son zhing shes pa'i 'og tu rkang pa dang se gol dang lud pa'i sgra dag gis go bar mi byed pa lan smad pa med do //
translated: Except for the desire for peace, there is no fault in not making oneself understood with the sounds of feet, fingersnaps, or coughing after having arrived and understood by the power of another's purpose.

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong dag rtsod pa'i gros dang 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol ba'i bsam pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong dag rtsod pa'i gros dang 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol ba'i bsam pa'o //
translated: The agent of this is the thought of the monks to engage in disputes and quarrels.

original: 'di la yang yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la yang yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar gyur te /
translated: Here, the actual downfall occurs through five factors.

original: phyogs gnyi ga dge slong nyid yin pa dang / rtsod pa gang yang rung ba'i gros byed pa dang / 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol ba nyid dang / nyan rnas 'dug pa nyid dang / sgra dang bcas pa'i don go ba nyid do //
analyzed: phyogs gnyi ga dge slong nyid yin pa dang / rtsod pa gang yang rung ba'i gros byed pa dang / 'khrug long bya ba la gzhol ba nyid dang / nyan rnas 'dug pa nyid dang / sgra dang bcas pa'i don go ba nyid do //
translated: and the meaning is understood.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these factors is incomplete, then the downfall is a serious transgression, a minor infraction, or a minor offense, depending on the circumstances.

original: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
translated: The downfall of preparation is a minor offense.

original: ji srid du nyan rna las gyur ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
analyzed: ji srid du nyan rna las gyur ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
translated: As long as one has begun the preparations for the downfall of listening to quarrels but has not yet reached the point of no return, one has a minor offense.

original: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
analyzed: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
translated: For each of the preparations that one has begun but not completed, one has a minor offense.

original: sgra thos la don ma go ba la nyes byas so //
analyzed: sgra thos la don ma go ba la nyes byas so //
translated: If one hears the words but does not understand the meaning, one has a minor offense.

original: 'thab gcugs byed na nyes byas so //
analyzed: 'thab gcugs byed na nyes byas so //
translated: If one quarrels, one has a minor offense.

original: 'thab pa la nyan na nyes byas so //
analyzed: 'thab pa la nyan na nyes byas so //
translated: If one listens to a quarrel, one has a minor offense.

original: 'thab mo byed pa'i drung du 'dug na nyes byas so //
analyzed: 'thab mo byed pa'i drung du 'dug na nyes byas so //
translated: If one sits in the presence of those who are quarreling, one has a minor offense.

original: phyogs gcig dge slong nyid ma yin pa dang gnyi ga dge slong nyid ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
analyzed: phyogs gcig dge slong nyid ma yin pa dang gnyi ga dge slong nyid ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
translated: There is an offense of wrong conduct for one who is not a fully ordained monk on one side, and for both who are not fully ordained monks.

original: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
translated: The offense of wrong conduct in the preparatory stage is a minor offense.

original: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor pa yang de snyed de /
analyzed: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor pa yang de snyed de /
translated: As many as there are preparations, there are that many preparations of the preparations.

original: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
translated: The preparation of the preparation of a minor offense is also a minor offense.

original: ltung ba med pa ni nye bar zhi bar 'dod pa la ltung ba med de //
analyzed: ltung ba med pa ni nye bar zhi bar 'dod pa la ltung ba med de //
translated: There is no offense if one wishes to pacify,

original: nang dang bcas pa ma yin pa dang / gya tshom du 'jug pa dang / mnyan nas nye bar zhi bar bya'o snyam pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: nang dang bcas pa ma yin pa dang / gya tshom du 'jug pa dang / mnyan nas nye bar zhi bar bya'o snyam pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: if one is not accompanied by a fully ordained monk, if one enters carelessly, or if one thinks, “I will listen and then pacify it.”

original: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for a beginner, one who is insane, one who is deranged, or one who is overwhelmed by pain.

original: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
translated: The training rule is that a monk should train in not listening to gossip about any country or region at any time.

original: dge slong dag steng khang dang / bar khang dang / 'og khang dang / gnas khang dang / khyams dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa dang / lam dang / lam gol ba la sogs pa na gros byed la /
analyzed: dge slong dag steng khang dang / bar khang dang / 'og khang dang / gnas khang dang / khyams dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa dang / lam dang / lam gol ba la sogs pa na gros byed la /
translated: Monks may discuss matters in an upper room, a middle room, a lower room, a dwelling place, a courtyard, a door-hall, a stairway, an open area, a wilderness, a road, or a side road.

original: der 'gro dgos na rting sgra'am se gol gyi sgra'am /
analyzed: der 'gro dgos na rting sgra'am se gol gyi sgra'am /
translated: If you need to go there, make a sound with your heel, snap your fingers,

original: mgul bsal ba'i sgra bya'o //
analyzed: mgul bsal ba'i sgra bya'o //
translated: or clear your throat.

original: 'thab gcugs mi @4a * //
analyzed: 'thab gcugs mi @4a * //
translated: Do not quarrel.

original: bya'o // 'thab pa mnyan par mi bya'o //🔽'thab mo byed pa la nye bar bskor te 'dug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o // 'thab pa mnyan par mi bya'o // 'thab mo byed pa la nye bar bskor te 'dug par mi bya'o //
translated: Do not listen to quarrels.🔽Do not stand around watching a quarrel.

original: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi 'bad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi 'bad par mi bya'o //
translated: Strive to restore harmony.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The amendment is the same as before.

original: nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed de bdun cu drug pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed de bdun cu drug pa bshad zin to /
translated: This was the explanation of the seventy-sixth downfall.

original: // / mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni bcas pa dang gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: // / mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni bcas pa dang gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The bases of the downfall of going without speaking are of two kinds: according to the rules and according to the exceptions.

original: bcas pa'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcas pa'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
translated: The basis of the rules is this: The Blessed Buddha was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

original: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
translated: When the venerable Udayī had abandoned all the defilements, he manifested arhatship.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'am b'ir song ste snying las chung ngu ra 'dug /'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'am b'ir song ste snying las chung ngu ra 'dug /'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab /
translated: The venerable Saṅgharakṣita went to Kauśāmbī and stayed there with little difficulty.

original: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa de'i tshe na /
analyzed: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa de'i tshe na /
translated: When Atimārga and Revata had gone to their appointed places, Nanda and Upananda were sitting in the midst of the saṅgha.

original: bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gdug cing pha rol gnon pa dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin par gyur nas de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gdug cing pha rol gnon pa dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin par gyur nas de dag gis smras pa /
translated: The group of seventeen monks were wicked and violent, and they were the ones who held the discourses, the discipline, and the Mātṛkā. They said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho 'tshams te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho 'tshams te /
translated: “Venerables, the group of six has been harassing us for a long time.

original: ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho 'tshams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis ma btsams la /
analyzed: ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho 'tshams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis ma btsams la /
translated: They have not harassed anyone else as much as they have harassed Nanda and Upananda.

original: ji ltar nye dgas tho 'tshams pa ltar yang dga' bos ma btsams kyis nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar nye dgas tho 'tshams pa ltar yang dga' bos ma btsams kyis nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
translated: They have not harassed anyone else as much as Upananda has harassed Nanda. We should do a procedure of ejecting Upananda from the place.”

original: de nas kha cig gis smras pa /
analyzed: de nas kha cig gis smras pa /
translated: Then some said,

original: 'di phu bo dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin pas bdag cag gis 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'di phu bo dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin pas bdag cag gis 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus so //
translated: “We can’t do a procedure of ejecting him from the place, because his elder brother Nanda is skilled in debate.”

original: kha cig gis smras pa /
analyzed: kha cig gis smras pa /
translated: Some said,🔽“We should do a procedure of ejecting him from the place.”

original: gcig smra ba na gnyis kyis mnyan par mi bya bar tshogs smra na tshogs ni rgyal po dang 'dra bas gal te cung zad smra bar gyur na de'i tshe gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes de dag gis gnas ma la bshams nas gand'i brdungs te /
analyzed: gcig smra ba na gnyis kyis mnyan par mi bya bar tshogs smra na tshogs ni rgyal po dang 'dra bas gal te cung zad smra bar gyur na de'i tshe gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes de dag gis gnas ma la bshams nas gand'i brdungs te /
translated: When one speaks, two should not listen. When the assembly speaks, the assembly is like a king. If it should speak a little, then at that time the act of expulsion should be done.”🔽Having thus prepared the site, they struck the gavel

original: dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: and, with a question, they properly informed the monks.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na gleng ba po rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na gleng ba po rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa /
translated: When the entire saṅgha was seated and in agreement, the accuser sat at the end of the row of elders and said,

original: btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gi lto dral te rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tshig smras pa gang yin pa de dran nam /
analyzed: btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gi lto dral te rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tshig smras pa gang yin pa de dran nam /
translated: “Venerable Upasena, do you remember saying, ‘I will split the stomachs of the group of seventeen and wrap the Jetavana Grove with their intestines’?”

original: nye dgas smras pa /
analyzed: nye dgas smras pa /
translated: Upasena said,

original: tshe dang @4b ldan pa dag de ni don 'das pa yin na rma sos pa glengs te ci bya /
analyzed: tshe dang @4b ldan pa dag de ni don 'das pa yin na rma sos pa glengs te ci bya /
translated: “Venerables, that is a past matter. Why bring up an old wound that has healed?”

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: They said,

original: bcom ldan 'das ni 'das pa'i don kho na la brten te 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni 'das pa'i don kho na la brten te 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar mdzad do //
translated: “The Blessed One established the bases of training for the hearers in the Vinaya only in dependence on past events.”

original: dga' bos phyir bzlog par btsams pa dang / de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: dga' bos phyir bzlog par btsams pa dang / de dag gis smras pa /
translated: Upacālā tried to stop them, but they said,

original: gang gcig phyir zlog par byed pa de yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
analyzed: gang gcig phyir zlog par byed pa de yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
translated: “We will do a procedure of ejecting anyone who tries to stop us.”

original: dga' bos bsams pa /
analyzed: dga' bos bsams pa /
translated: Upacālā thought,

original: 'di dag gi byed stangs las na bdag la yang gnas nas 'byin pa'i las byed par gyur na ma legs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
analyzed: 'di dag gi byed stangs las na bdag la yang gnas nas 'byin pa'i las byed par gyur na ma legs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
translated: “If they do this, it will not be good if they do a procedure of ejecting me.”

original: de dgun gyi dus la bab pas la ba zhig gyon te 'ongs nas des la bde rtsig drung du blangs te /
analyzed: de dgun gyi dus la bab pas la ba zhig gyon te 'ongs nas des la bde rtsig drung du blangs te /
translated: When winter arrived, she put on a woolen cloak and came. She took off the cloak in front of the wall

original: bzhag nas cang mi smra bar stan las langs te song ngo //
analyzed: bzhag nas cang mi smra bar stan las langs te song ngo //
translated: and left without saying anything.

original: de dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: de dag gis smras pa /
translated: They said,🔽“Venerables, speak!

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod pa smros shig ces de dag gis gya tshom du nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod pa smros shig ces de dag gis gya tshom du nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
translated: ” They did a procedure of ejecting Upacālā in a state of confusion.

original: de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa na ngu zhing phu bo'i gan du song ba dang / dga' bos smras pa /
analyzed: de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa na ngu zhing phu bo'i gan du song ba dang / dga' bos smras pa /
translated: Nanda said to him,

original: nye dga' ci'i phyir du /
analyzed: nye dga' ci'i phyir du /
translated: “Upananda, why are you crying?”

original: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
analyzed: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
translated: “The monks with black bowls have carried out the act of banishing me.”

original: dga' bos smras pa /
analyzed: dga' bos smras pa /
translated: Nanda said,

original: gang dag gis kho bo'i nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang grong khyer dang / khams gsum nas gnas nas phyung bar gyur cig /'on kyang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dag la grong dang grong khyer med dam ci sdod la phyis bzod par gsol cig /'di ltar de dag gis mi mthun pa'i las kho nar byas so //
analyzed: gang dag gis kho bo'i nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang grong khyer dang / khams gsum nas gnas nas phyung bar gyur cig /'on kyang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dag la grong dang grong khyer med dam ci sdod la phyis bzod par gsol cig /'di ltar de dag gis mi mthun pa'i las kho nar byas so //
translated: “May those who carried out the act of banishing my younger brother be banished from the towns, cities, and the three realms! But why do those who carry out the act of banishing not live in towns and cities? Wait and then ask for forgiveness. They have only done what is not in accord with the Dharma.”

original: su zhig der ma 'ongs /
analyzed: su zhig der ma 'ongs /
translated: “Who has not come there?”

original: dga' bos smras pa /
analyzed: dga' bos smras pa /
translated: Nanda said,

original: kho bo'o // bdag gis de na rgan pa'i mtha' logs su slob dpon gyi sgra thos so ;
analyzed: kho bo'o // bdag gis de na rgan pa'i mtha' logs su slob dpon gyi sgra thos so ;
translated: “I have. I heard the sound of the master at the end of the line of the elders there.”

original: / dga' bos bdag nyid ji ltar cang mi smra bar stan las langs te song ba'i skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang / dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro bar byed ces smod par byed /
analyzed: / dga' bos bdag nyid ji ltar cang mi smra bar stan las langs te song ba'i skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang / dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro bar byed ces smod par byed /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One said, “Monks, a monk should not get up from his seat and leave while the Saṅgha is engaged in a legal issue that concerns the Dharma.

analyzed: phyar kha gtong bar byed /

analyzed: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //

translated: Having seen the ten benefits, the Buddha laid down the precepts for my disciples in the Vinaya:

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The place was Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni dga' bo //

original: nyon mongs pa ni las dang mi mthun par 'dod pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni las dang mi mthun par 'dod pa /
translated: The affliction was desire that was not in accord with his actions.

translated: The offense was to get up from one’s seat and leave without saying anything when the Saṅgha was engaged in a legal procedure in accordance with the Dharma.

original: gnang ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so ;
analyzed: gnang ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so ;
translated: The introduction to the story is this: The Buddha, the Blessed One, was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada’s park.

original: / dge slong nad ngan can dag 'khod pa de dag gis yun ring du 'dug par mi nus pa na dge slong nad g-yog dag gis kyang nad pa dag gi bya ba nyams par byed /
analyzed: / dge slong nad ngan can dag 'khod pa de dag gis yun ring du 'dug par mi nus pa na dge slong nad g-yog dag gis kyang nad pa dag gi bya ba nyams par byed /
translated: The monks who were sick could not stay there for a long time. The monks who were nursing the sick neglected their duties.🔽The monks who were in charge of the affairs of the saṅgha neglected the duties of the saṅgha. The monks reported this matter to the Blessed One,

original: dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: and the Blessed One said,

original: de lta bas na dge slong 'dug pa la smras te 'gro bar bya'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dug pa la smras te /
analyzed: de lta bas na dge slong 'dug pa la smras te 'gro bar bya'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dug pa la smras te /
translated: “Therefore, you should say to the monks who are staying there, ‘I am going.’

original: 'gro bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: 'gro bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
translated: The Blessed One said, ‘You should say to the monks who are staying there, “I am going.”’

original: dge slong zhig gis khyim gzhan du ltung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas ci tsam na der me shor nas dge slong des 'gro bar brtsams te de lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang / bdag gis dge slong 'dug pa la ma smras so snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas /
analyzed: dge slong zhig gis khyim gzhan du ltung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas ci tsam na der me shor nas dge slong des 'gro bar brtsams te de lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang / bdag gis dge slong 'dug pa la ma smras so snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas /
translated: A monk left his begging bowl and robes in another's house. When a fire broke out, the monk started to leave. When he had gone halfway, he remembered,🔽I did not tell the monk who lives there.

original: de phyir log ste ji srid du dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig nas /
analyzed: de phyir log ste ji srid du dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig nas /
translated: He returned and by the time he had told the monk who lived there, his begging bowl and robes had burned up.

original: de der song ba dang khyim bdag gis smras pa ;
analyzed: de der song ba dang khyim bdag gis smras pa ;
translated: When he went there, the householder said,

original: 'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du 'phyis te byon /
analyzed: 'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du 'phyis te byon /
translated: Noble one, why did you come so late?

original: des na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig gis gal te khyod myur du byon par gyur na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing /
analyzed: des na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig gis gal te khyod myur du byon par gyur na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing /
translated: If you had come quickly, your begging bowl and robes would not have burned.

original: dge slong de yang phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan @5b 'das la gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong de yang phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan @5b 'das la gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: and the Blessed One said,

original: de lta bas na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs so //
analyzed: de lta bas na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs so //
translated: “Therefore, except in such circumstances, this is not to be done.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang / de'i shas che ba dang / de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang / bslab pa la gus pa dang / bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang / de'i shas che ba dang / de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One, having praised the desire for training, respect for training, and the austerity of training, spoke in a way that accorded with, was relevant to, and appropriate for the training rules, and said to the monks,

original: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
translated: “Therefore, monks, the previous allowance is revoked.

original: 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
translated: This is not to be done.🔽My disciples should recite this training rule:

original: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
analyzed: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
translated: My śrāvakas should recite this basis of training in the Vinaya:

original: yang dge slong gang dag 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro zhing /
analyzed: yang dge slong gang dag 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro zhing /
translated: Also, the Blessed One laid down a rule:🔽“If a monk, when a legal issue has arisen in the Saṅgha, gets up from his seat and leaves without saying anything,

original: dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: except in the case of an emergency, he commits an offense entailing confession.”

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The location for this rule is Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni dge slong don nyung du dag / nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //
analyzed: gang zag ni dge slong don nyung du dag / nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //
translated: The person is a monk who has few duties. There is no affliction or offense.

original: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu dga' bo'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu dga' bo'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
translated: As for “a monk,” it refers to Nanda, the son of the Śākyas, or anyone else like him.

original: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
translated: “The Saṅgha’s” refers to the Saṅgha of the Tathāgata’s disciples.

original: chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung pa na zhes bya ba ni gsol pa dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi las byung ba na'o //
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung pa na zhes bya ba ni gsol pa dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi las byung ba na'o //
translated: “When a legal issue has arisen in the Saṅgha” refers to a legal issue that has arisen in the Saṅgha through a motion, a motion and a single announcement, or a motion and three announcements.

original: cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro zhing zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i nye 'khor las langs te 'gro zhing ngo //
analyzed: cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro zhing zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i nye 'khor las langs te 'gro zhing ngo //
translated: “Without saying anything” means without saying anything to the one who is leaving.

original: dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o //
analyzed: dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o //
translated: “If he does not speak to a monk who is sitting” means to a monk who is sitting there.

original: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni gleng gzhi las dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par gyur pa de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te'o //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni gleng gzhi las dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par gyur pa de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te'o //
translated: “Except if there are such circumstances” means except if there are such circumstances as those mentioned in the nidāna, where a monk who is speaking to a monk who is sitting there has his bowl and robes burned.

original: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “One commits an offense entailing confession”: as above.

original: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is an offense here?

original: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang / ltung ba med pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, one should understand the characteristics of the offense through the main part, the preparation, the steps of the preparation, the offense, the absence of an offense, the training, and the amendment of offenses.

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / @6a * //
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / @6a * //
translated: Here, the actual basis of a downfall is defined as follows:

original: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bdag nyid gso sbyong dang dgag dbye la sogs pa las brgya rtsa gcig chos dang ldan pa nyid du byed pa la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dus pa brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba dge slong gcig la ma smras par 'gro🔽na thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das na mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //🔽gsol ba la sogs pa'i las brgya rtsa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //🔽de dag chos dang ldan pa nyid du byed pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bdag nyid gso sbyong dang dgag dbye la sogs pa las brgya rtsa gcig chos dang ldan pa nyid du byed pa la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dus pa brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba dge slong gcig la ma smras par 'gro na thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das na mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro // gsol ba la sogs pa'i las brgya rtsa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do // de dag chos dang ldan pa nyid du byed pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: A monk who is not permitted to participate in the confession ceremony, the lifting of restrictions, and so forth, because he has not fulfilled one hundred and one requirements related to the confession ceremony, and who has not informed another monk that he will not participate in the ceremony, commits the actual downfall of not informing if he leaves the vicinity of the ceremony before it is over.🔽He does not commit this downfall if he is not permitted to participate in any of the one hundred and one ceremonies related to the confession ceremony, or if he is not permitted to participate in any of the ceremonies related to the lifting of restrictions, and so forth.

original: bdag la byed pa dang / gzhan la byed pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: bdag la byed pa dang / gzhan la byed pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: He does not commit this downfall if he is not permitted to participate in any of the one hundred and one ceremonies related to the confession ceremony, or if he is not permitted to participate in any of the ceremonies related to the lifting of restrictions, and so forth.🔽He does not commit this downfall if he is not permitted to participate in any of the one hundred and one ceremonies related to the confession ceremony, or if he is not permitted to participate in any of the ceremonies related to the lifting of restrictions, and so forth.🔽He does not commit this downfall if he is not permitted to participate in any of the one hundred and one ceremonies related to the confession ceremony, or if he is not permitted to participate in any of the ceremonies related to the lifting of restrictions, and so forth.🔽He does not commit this downfall if he is not permitted to participate in any of the one hundred and one ceremonies related to the confession ceremony, or if he is not permitted to participate in any of the ceremonies related to the lifting of restrictions, and so forth.

original: dge 'dun 'dus pa'i nang du lus kyis 'dus pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: dge 'dun 'dus pa'i nang du lus kyis 'dus pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the assembly of monks is gathered, but the monk is not.

original: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk has not been accused of an offense.

original: ltag 'og na 'dug pa'i dge slong gcig la ma smras pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: ltag 'og na 'dug pa'i dge slong gcig la ma smras pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk has not been accused by a monk who is seated above or below him.

original: thos pa'i nyen kor las 'das pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: thos pa'i nyen kor las 'das pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk has gone beyond the range of hearing.

original: las brtsams pa la na smad pa med do //
analyzed: las brtsams pa la na smad pa med do //
translated: There is no offense if the monk has begun an action.

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi gsol ba la sogs pa'i las chos dang ldan pa nyid dang / dge slong 'khod pa la ma smras pa dang / brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi gsol ba la sogs pa'i las chos dang ldan pa nyid dang / dge slong 'khod pa la ma smras pa dang / brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung ba'o //
translated: The agent in this case is the monk who is accused by the saṅgha in a legal procedure that is in accordance with the Dharma, who has not been accused by a monk who is seated above or below him, and who has not been accused by a monk who is within the range of hearing.

original: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The basis of the downfall is a monk who has five qualities:

original: dge 'dun gyi gsol ba la sogs pa'i las chos dang ldan pa nyid dang / bdag nyid kyi lus kyis der 'dus pa nyid dang / brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung na dge slong 'khod pa la ma smras pa nyid dang / thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'da' bar 'dod pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gsol ba la sogs pa'i las chos dang ldan pa nyid dang / bdag nyid kyi lus kyis der 'dus pa nyid dang / brtad pa'i bya ba ma byung na dge slong 'khod pa la ma smras pa nyid dang / thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'da' bar 'dod pa nyid dang /
translated: one wishes to go beyond the vicinity of hearing,

original: thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das par song ba nyid do //
analyzed: thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das par song ba nyid do //
translated: and one has gone beyond the vicinity of hearing.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these factors are incomplete, one is at fault in the appropriate way.

original: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
translated: The downfall of preparation is a minor infraction.

original: ji srid du mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams pa nas /
analyzed: ji srid du mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams pa nas /
translated: As long as one has not reached the actual downfall of going without speaking,

original: dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
analyzed: dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
translated: one has a minor infraction.

original: las brgya rtsa gcig nyid ma yin par rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa zhu ba la sogs pa'i las la nyes byas so //
analyzed: las brgya rtsa gcig nyid ma yin par rab tu 'byung ba la ltos pa zhu ba la sogs pa'i las la nyes byas so //
translated: As long as one has not reached the actual downfall, one has a minor infraction for each of the one hundred and one actions, such as requesting ordination.

original: thos pa'i nye 'khor las ma 'das kyi par du nyes byas so //
analyzed: thos pa'i nye 'khor las ma 'das kyi par du nyes byas so //
translated: As long as one has not gone beyond the vicinity of hearing, one has a minor infraction.

original: don med pa dang mi rigs pas 'gro ba ni dge slong la smras te 'gro na yang nyes byas so //🔽gsol ba dang gnyis sam /
analyzed: don med pa dang mi rigs pas 'gro ba ni dge slong la smras te 'gro na yang nyes byas so // gsol ba dang gnyis sam /
translated: If one goes to a non-monastery or to a place where there are no monks, or if one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, but does not tell a monk, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, and tells a monk, but does not do the announcement and the formal procedure of the first motion, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las la ni gsol ba byas la las brjod pa ma brtsams pa'i skabs su thos pa'i nyen kor las 'das na yang nyes byas so //🔽chos @6b dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa'i las la ni ma smras par thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das na yang nyes byas so /
analyzed: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las la ni gsol ba byas la las brjod pa ma brtsams pa'i skabs su thos pa'i nyen kor las 'das na yang nyes byas so // chos @6b dang ldan pa nyid ma yin pa'i las la ni ma smras par thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das na yang nyes byas so /
translated: If one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, tells a monk, and does the announcement and the formal procedure of the first motion, but does not do the formal procedure of the second motion, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, tells a monk, does the announcement and the formal procedure of the first motion, and does the formal procedure of the second motion, but does not do the formal procedure of the third motion, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, tells a monk, does the announcement and the formal procedures of the first and second motions, but does not do the formal procedure of the third motion, and then goes beyond earshot, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: sbyor pa'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /🔽sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /🔽sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
analyzed: sbyor pa'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste / sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de / sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
translated: If one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, tells a monk, does the announcement and the formal procedures of the first and second motions, does the formal procedure of the third motion, but then goes beyond earshot before the motion is finished, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, tells a monk, does the announcement and the formal procedures of the first and second motions, does the formal procedure of the third motion, and then goes beyond earshot after the motion is finished, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong la smras pa dang / brtad pa'i bya ba byung ba la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong la smras pa dang / brtad pa'i bya ba byung ba la ltung ba med do //
translated: If one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, tells a monk, does the announcement and the formal procedures of the first and second motions, does the formal procedure of the third motion, and then goes beyond earshot while the motion is being done, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If one goes to a monastery or to a place where there are monks, tells a monk, does the announcement and the formal procedures of the first and second motions, does the formal procedure of the third motion, and then goes beyond earshot after the motion

original: bdag nyid lus ma 'dus par 'dun pa dang yongs su dag pa phul ba la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: bdag nyid lus ma 'dus par 'dun pa dang yongs su dag pa phul ba la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one is unable to attend due to illness, or if one offers one’s complete purity.

original: thos pa'i yul las mi 'da' bar 'dod pas 'das pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: thos pa'i yul las mi 'da' bar 'dod pas 'das pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one wishes to avoid a place where there is a lot of noise.

original: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang ; tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: las dang po pa dang / smyos pa dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang ; tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense if one is a beginner, or if one is insane, or if one’s mind is disturbed, or if one is overwhelmed by pain.

original: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
translated: The training is to not rely on any of the aspects of the downfall of going without speaking to anyone in all places and at all times.

original: gsol ba la sogs pa'i las chos dang mi ldan pa nyid mi bya'o//
analyzed: gsol ba la sogs pa'i las chos dang mi ldan pa nyid mi bya'o//
translated: One should not perform a legal procedure that is not in accordance with the Dharma.

original: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The amendment is as before.

original: mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu bdun pa bshad zin no /
analyzed: mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu bdun pa bshad zin no /
translated: This was the seventy-seventh downfall.

original: // / ma gus pa'i tshul gyi ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan dka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
analyzed: // / ma gus pa'i tshul gyi ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan dka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
translated: The origin story of the downfall of disrespect: The Blessed Buddha was staying in the Kalandaka­nivāpa in the Veṇuvana near Rājagṛha.

original: de'i tshe glang chen snying po'i bu dge slong nag pa glang chen lhas zhes bya ba dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe glang chen snying po'i bu dge slong nag pa glang chen lhas zhes bya ba dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste /

original: 'di ni 'dul ba'o //

translated: He alone opposed the saṅgha,

original: dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa bzung ste rtsod cing 'dug la /
analyzed: dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa bzung ste rtsod cing 'dug la /

original: gtam gyi mjug sdod par mi byed /🔽gus bar mi byed /
analyzed: gtam gyi mjug sdod par mi byed / gus bar mi byed /
translated: He did not let the discussion come to an end.🔽He was not respectful.

original: rjes mi byed cing /
analyzed: rjes mi byed cing /
translated: He did not follow the rules.

original: phyir smra bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste /
analyzed: phyir smra bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste /
translated: “Monks, why do some monks, for the sake of a few monks,

original: 'di ni chos so //
analyzed: 'di ni chos so //
translated: ‘This is the Dharma,

original: 'di ni 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dul ba'o //
translated: this is the Vinaya,🔽this is the Teacher’s instruction,’

original: 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa'o zhes rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir dpong sa'i khang par 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na gcig pu'i dge 'dun zlog par byed /
analyzed: 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa'o zhes rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir dpong sa'i khang par 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na gcig pu'i dge 'dun zlog par byed /
translated: sit in the storehouse and, in agreement, turn back the Saṅgha alone,🔽cause the Saṅgha to be divided alone,🔽take up a dispute,

original: gcig pus dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa bzung ste rtsod cing 'dug la gtam gyi @7a * //
analyzed: gcig pus dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa bzung ste rtsod cing 'dug la gtam gyi @7a * //
translated: and sit arguing,

analyzed: mjug sdud par mi byed /

original: gus par mi byed /
analyzed: gus par mi byed /
